title: Water for the city
creator_credit: Dan McCarroll, Frank Stokes and Film Associates
brief_description: Demonstrates that water needed by people in a city begins as rain and snow that form rivers, lakes and underground water basins. Depicts the ways in which this water is purified and brought into homes in the city. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Dan McCarroll, Frank Stokes and Film Associates
